name: Semrush - Core Components Library
description:
Intergalactic Design System is a constantly developing system of UI components, guidelines and UX patterns.


Main features of the library:

  • 50+ сomponents. All of them are carefully crafted with AutoLayout and Variants.
  • Fully flexible components.
  • All basic components are interactive so you can use them in your interactive prototypes and save your time!
  • All components has links to guides and hints about usage.
  • Library has tutorial playground which will help you to know hacks and tips about using components ✨


---

We recommend you to use this library with our Chart components and Icons libraries.
